mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_wechat (id, union_id, open_id, access_token, expires_in, refresh_token, create_time, nick_name, sex, province, city, country, head_img_url, privilege) VALUES (#{id}, #{unionId}, #{openId}, #{accessToken}, #{expiresIn}, #{refreshToken}, #{createTime},#{nickName}, #{sex}, #{province}, #{city},#{country}, #{headImgUrl}, #{privilege});
